title: Grounds: ship a public demo
context: We want a premium-looking demo that generates a decision-grade report people can share. The product should avoid domain-specific language and work globally. The UI should feel alive: micro-motion, hover color shifts, and calm typography.
intent: Build a v0.1 that reliably produces a polished HTML report and optional PDF export. Include 2026-ready signals (half-life, blind spots, perspective shift) without sounding robotic.
options: Ship minimal: one page + simple report
Ship full: report + ledger export + 2026 signals
Delay: polish longer and risk never shipping
assumptions: People want a short briefing, not a wall of text
A transparent heuristic score is enough for an MVP
Offline HTML reports are universally shareable
risks: Scope creep: adding too much too early
UI feels like a dashboard instead of a premium brief
evidence: A complete report template with consistent tone
Deterministic scoring rules (readiness, half-life, blind spots)
A clear set of lenses for perspective shift
